title: B.Sokal Sinking Island [2008|RUS] ND
description:
B.Sokal Sinking Island [RUSSIAN only]

Game type: Adventure                Translated by: Novii Disk
Size: 1 DVD                         Date: 2008-02-07


Game Notes
~~~~~~~~~~
Walter Jones, a billionaire, is found dead at the bottom of a huge Art Deco tower that he had built on a tropical island. The hotel that he had hoped to turn into a holiday resort for the international jet set turned out to be his last resting place. 

You play the role of inspector Jack Norm. While a storm is raging, you have three days to find out the truth behind this mysterious death. 
Accident or premeditated murder?  

Which of the ten people on the island at the time of the death might have reason to want Walter Jones dead?


Install Notes
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1. Mount or Burn iso
2. Install                          also install patch 1.01
3. Play                             use NoCD
